title: What did the Euro roadies think of gravel worlds? ‘No race I’ve done on the road is as hard as today’
content:
Vollering, Mohorič, Vermeersch, and other gravel newbies give their takes on on the UCI Gravel World Championships race.

Read the full article at What did the Euro roadies think of gravel worlds? ‘No race I’ve done on the road is as hard as today’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
